description.value: You grab a foe to better strike at their most sensitive regions. Attempt to [[/act grapple]] a creature within your reach. If you succeed, make an unarmed melee Strike against that creature you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}. You don't need a free hand to make this Strike. If that attack hits and deals damage, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. Both the Grapple and the Strike count toward your multiple attack penalty, but you don't increase the penalty until you've made both attacks.
